definition: informal terms for a human head, to hit on the head, especially with a pitched baseball
details:
noun
- informal terms for a human head
= synonyms: attic
- any of various edible seeds of plants of the family Leguminosae used for food
= synonyms: edible bean
- any of various leguminous plants grown for their edible seeds and pods
= synonyms: bean plant
- any of various seeds or fruits that are beans or resemble beans
verb
- to hit on the head, especially with a pitched baseball
= example: to hit on the head, especially with a pitched baseball
